T02D3754:89a-1: ma h'a yaksha aa pa ra dze rta s'a bha nam tantra /
T02D3754:89a-3: gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rgyud /
T02D3754:89a-4: dpal phyag na do rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3754:89a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor bdag gi sgrub thabs 'di gsungs so //
T02D3754:89a-6: nor rgyas par 'dod pa gang dag gis gnas dben
T02D3754:89a-7: zhing nyams dga' ba'i sar mandal legs par byas te
T02D3754:89a-13: sil snyan bkod pa'i dbus su bum pa mdzes pa 'o ma dang /
T02D3754:89b-0: chus bkang ste ldum lcug dang bcas pa snam bu gtsang mas @89b dkris te /
T02D3754:89b-1: srad bu sngon po btags la phyag na rdo rje bsnyen par bya ste /
T02D3754:89b-2: yid bzhin nor bu 'bum du bzlas la bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D3754:89b-3: aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D3754:89b-4: de nas nor lha nyid bsgrub pa ni khang bu
T02D3754:89b-5: shin tu dben par dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la ba'i
T02D3754:89b-7: de la padma 'dab brgyad lte ba dang bcas pa bri /
T02D3754:89b-8: lte ba dkar po 'dab ma brgyad ser por bya'o //
T02D3754:89b-9: de la rin po che'i me tog dgram /
T02D3754:89b-10: dbus su bum pa dgod / steng du sku gzhag
T02D3754:89b-11: / mdun du zan dkar po'i gtor ma dkar gsum
T02D3754:89b-12: dang / mngar gsum tshod ma sna tshogs dang dri dang rtsi sman gyis brgyan te gzhag go ;
T02D3754:89b-13: / mchod pa'i rdzas dag kyang dgod la /
T02D3754:89b-14: dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
T02D3754:89b-15: dpal phyag na rdo rje bskyed rim ji lta ba
T02D3754:89b-16: bzhin bsgoms pa'i mdun du pam las rin po che'i
T02D3754:89b-17: padma'i lte ba la hr'i: dkar dmar las skyes pa'i
T02D3754:89b-18: nor lha zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D3754:89b-19: dkar zhing dmar ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa phyag g-yas pas rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa /
T02D3754:89b-20: g-yon gyis rin chen bee d'urya'o //
T02D3754:89b-21: rin po che'i gdan la 'bab bzhugs kyis skyil krung du bzhugs pa /
T02D3754:89b-22: gsus po che byis pa'i gzugs lta bu can /
T02D3754:89b-23: bzhin mdzes pa spyan 'bur la che ba /
T02D3754:89b-24: rin po che'i rgyan gyis kun du bklubs pa'i dam
T02D3754:89b-25: tshig gi gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub
T02D3754:89b-26: pa bsams la / bdag dang g-yog po'i dpral bar aom /
T02D3754:89b-30: gsang bar phat kyis bsrungs te ye shes dgug gzhug bya'o //
T02D3754:89b-31: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung po kun gyi rgyal //
T02D3754:89b-32: gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa ;
T02D3754:89b-33: / gnas 'dir mchod pa 'bul gyis myur du sbyon //
T02D3754:89b-34: bdag la zas nor stsol zhing bzhugs su sbyon //
T02D3754:89b-35: ae hye hi yaksha aa pa r'a dzi ta sa
T02D3754:89b-36: pa ri w'a ra a'a gatstsha ya a'a gatstsha ya
T02D3754:89b-37: h'um dza / des ni mdun du byon par bltas te /
T02D3754:89b-38: bdud bsal ba'i phyir rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag
T02D3754:89b-39: rgya'am yungs kar 'phang zhing aom a'a:pi ghn'an ta krit
T02D3754:89b-40: h'um phat ces pas rnam par phye nas mchod yon
T02D3754:89b-41: phul te / dam tshig la mngon par bcug la mchod pa phul nas bstod pa byas te /
T02D3754:89b-42: aom gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa //
T02D3754:89b-43: zhal gcig phyag gnyis byis pa'i gzugs 'dra can //
T02D3754:90a-0: phyag g-yon yid bzhin rin chen @90a * //
T02D3754:90a-2: thugs kar 'dzin mdzad mi zad nor gyi bdag / phyag g-yas lcags kyu 'dzin zhing rgyal pa dang //
T02D3754:90a-3: btsun mo la sogs dgug dang dbang du mdzad //
T02D3754:90a-4: dung mdog 'od 'phro rin chen rgyan mdzes ldan //
T02D3754:90a-5: rin chen gdan la rgyal sras skyil krung bzhugs //
T02D3754:90a-6: 'jig rten zas nor kun gyi bdag po ste //
T02D3754:90a-7: gang gis khyod bsgrub phongs pa'i 'jigs sel mdzod //
T02D3754:90a-8: nor lha'i rgyal po bkra shis 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02D3754:90a-9: 'jam pa'i rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3754:90a-10: de'i rjes la rgyal ba sras bcas mchod la /
T02D3754:90a-11: de dag gis lha mo mngon par sbrul te bum
T02D3754:90a-12: pa lha'i bdud rtsis bkang bas mngon par bkrus par
T02D3754:90a-13: bsam mo // spyi bor dpal phyag na rdo rjes rgyas gdab bo //
T02D3754:90a-15: skad che bar ma yin chung bar ma yin myur
T02D3754:90a-16: bar ma yin bul bar ma yin par smra ba
T02D3754:90a-17: bcad cing rnam par g-yeng pa la sogs pa spangs
T02D3754:90a-18: te bzlas so // aom hrim phrim aa pa ra dzi ta dza dza h'um phat /
T02D3754:90a-19: bzlas pa gtong ba'i dus su mchod pa phul la gtor ma yang sbyin te /
T02D3754:90a-20: gtor snod bhr'um las rin po cher bsam /
T02D3754:90a-23: h'um gis bdud rtsir bsgyur te phyag na rdo rje la rang sngags kyis dbul /
T02D3754:90a-24: gnod sbyin nor lha la sngags aom hri dza yaksha
T02D3754:90a-25: aa pa ra dzi ta sa pa ri w'a ra
T02D3754:90a-26: aa mri ta ba lim kha kha kh'a hi kh'a
T02D3754:90a-27: hi dam ba lim bhaksha yam /
T02D3754:90a-28: ma ma ba su pushtim ku ru sarba dza ga ba shingku ru ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3754:90a-29: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'adya
T02D3754:90a-30: nutpan na tv'at aom a'a:h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pa
T02D3754:90a-31: dang / tshigs su bcad pas kyang bsngos la /
T02D3754:90a-32: bstod pa bya chos bshad de phrin las bcol /
T02D3754:90a-33: aom bh'u ta hri ya pa ra dzi ta ratna
T02D3754:90a-34: na ma sarba tri sampa ti sv'a h'a zhes pa
T02D3754:90a-35: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te bskul lo //
T02D3754:90a-36: de nas dge ba bsngos la aa pa ra dzi ta badzra mu:/
T02D3754:90a-37: zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D3754:90a-38: thun gnyis pa la sogs pa la dam tshig chig rdzogs su bskyed la /
T02D3754:90a-39: ye shes dgug pa la sogs pa sngar bzhin du bya'o //
T02D3754:90a-40: tshes gcig nas bco lnga'i bar du bsgrub bo //
T02D3754:90a-41: bco lnga'i zhag gi dang po nas tho rangs kyi bar du sngags rgyun ma chad par bzlas /
T02D3754:90a-42: lce pog dkar po'i bdug pa dbul /
T02D3754:90a-43: tho rangs grub pa'i rtags snang ba ni rab gzugs
T02D3754:90a-44: mngon sum du ston te bdag gis ji ltar bya
T02D3754:90b-0: zer te sgrub pa pos bdag gi bka' nyon @90b
T02D3754:90b-1: cig bya'o // mna' bsgag dam chu blud ci 'dod pa bcol /
T02D3754:90b-2: rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya bstan te phan chad bka'
T02D3754:90b-3: nyan te de la zhon nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
T02D3754:90b-4: mthong ngo // lha'i gnas su bskyal nas lha'i dbang pos dbang skur bar byed do //
T02D3754:90b-6: gzugs sgra gang byung yang skrag par mi bya'o //
T02D3754:90b-7: de lta bu'i mtshan ma ma byung na nam langs
T02D3754:90b-8: pa'i dus su rmi lam brtag / des ma grub
T02D3754:90b-9: na phyi ma'i zla ba la de bzhin du bsgrub
T02D3754:90b-10: / des kyang ma grub na yang phyi ma'i zla ba la bsgrub bo //
T02D3754:90b-11: de nas dngos grub ni rab rig pa'i rgyal po'i dbang thob bo //
T02D3754:90b-16: dgra dang nad thams cad zhi bar byed do //
T02D3754:90b-17: tshe ring ba bskal pa bdun thub par 'gyur /
T02D3754:90b-18: nor mang ba zad pa med cing dpag tu med pa brjod kyis mi lang bar 'byor ro //
T02D3754:90b-19: gal te gnod par byed pa byung na yang khros
T02D3754:90b-20: pa tsam gyis de ma thag tu 'chi bar byed
T02D3754:90b-21: do // 'bring ni lta sgom gyi nyams myong skye /
T02D3754:90b-22: bud med thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing nor gyis phyug par 'gyur /
T02D3754:90b-23: bkra shis par byed pa dang dgra 'chi bar yang byed do //
T02D3754:90b-24: tha ma yang nor 'phel par byed cing dgra 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3754:90b-25: grub nas rtag tu bsten pa ni zla ba nya
T02D3754:90b-26: gang ba thams cad la gtor ma gtang bar bya'o
T02D3754:90b-27: // dngos grub gang byung ba de cha drug tu
T02D3754:90b-28: bgos te bla ma dang dkon mchog gsum spyi dang
T02D3754:90b-29: // / sems can dag la cha re re sbyin /
T02D3754:90b-30: phyed kyis sgrub pa po'i 'tsho ba bya'o //
T02D3754:90b-31: sgrub pa'i dus su zas dkar gsum bza' zhing gtsang sbra dang ldan par bya'o //
T02D3754:90b-32: rtag tu khrus la brtson par bya'o ;
T02D3754:90b-33: /'di grub na yon tan dpag tu med do //
T02D3754:90b-34: 'di la gdeng bzhi dang ldan pas 'grub ste /
T02D3754:90b-35: mgo gnon ye shes bsnyen pa'i gdeng /
T02D3754:90b-37: mi nyams pa dam tshig gi gdeng /
T02D3754:90b-38: the tshom med pa nges pa'i gdeng ngo //
T02D3754:90b-39: de la lta ba ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes par bya'o //
T02D3754:90b-40: dam tshig ni bla ma mnyes par bya zhing gsang la sgrub ste /
T02D3754:90b-41: gzhan la thabs 'di bstan par mi bya'o //
T02D3754:90b-42: gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rgyud rdzogs so /
